TextBody:
Hello,

Here is the link for Fedora 40:

https://download.endpointprotector.com/linux_agent/EPPLinux_v2.4.3.1007/EPPClient_fedora_40_v2.4.3.1007_x86_64.tar.gz

It seems that we do not have a build for Fedora 41 yet. I will have to check with engineering to see if that is because a customer has not requested one yet or something else. I will update you on that when I hear back from engineering.

Thank you,
Zachary Roy
ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0Hr2xx:ref
Subject: Fedora 40 & 41 Installer    [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0Hr2xx:ref ]

TextBody:
Hello,

For the build, are the clients receiving the build going to have an internet connection or are they on an airgapped network?

Thank you,
Zachary Roy
